Submodules [hide private]
  • pushnotify.exceptions: Module for exceptions.
  • pushnotify.nma: Module for sending push notifications to Android devices that have Notify My Android installed.
  • pushnotify.prowl: Module for sending push notifications to iOS devices that have Prowl installed.
  • pushnotify.pushover: Module for sending push notificiations to Android and iOS devices that have Pushover installed.
  • pushnotify.tests: copyright: Copyright (c) Jeffrey Goettsch and other contributors.
    • pushnotify.tests.tests: Unit tests.

Function Details [hide private]

get_client(type_, developerkey='', application='')

source code  
Get a pushnotify client of the specified type.

Args:
    type_: A string containing the type of client to get. Valid
        types are 'nma,' 'prowl,', and 'pushover,' for Notify My
        Android, Prowl, and Pushover clients, respectively.
    developerkey: A string containing a valid developer key for the
        given type_ of client.
    application: A string containing the name of the application on
        behalf of whom the client will be sending messages.

Returns:
    An nma.Client, prowl.Client, or pushover.Client.
